author: Jessica Estepa
description: First lady Melania Trump is accompanying President Trump on his first foreign trip as commander-in-chief.
title: Melania Trump appears to swat the president's hand away

author: Joel B. Pollak
description: First Lady Melania Trump has won rave reviews as she accompanies President Donald Trump on his first foreign trip.
title: Melania Trump: Breakout Star of Trump's First Foreign Trip - Breitbart

author: Elizabeth Landers, CNN
description: First lady Melania Trump's fashion choices got rave reviews in local Saudi Arabian press Sunday, despite forgoing the customary headscarf.
title: Melania Trump gets rave reviews in Saudi press

author: https://www.facebook.com/chrisriotta/
description: Melania Trump's quick flick of the wrist may be her most candid move to date as first lady.
title: Melania Trump smacks away the president's hand at an Israeli airport

author: Kristina Wong
description: First lady Melania Trump and first daughter Ivanka Trump made headlines when they arrived Saturday morning in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia sans headscarves.
title: Melania and Ivanka Trump Forego Headscarves in Saudi Arabia - Breitbart

author: Aileen Graef and Kate Bennett
description: First lady Melania Trump and first daughter Ivanka Trump arrived in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Saturday morning sporting an absence of headscarves.
title: Melania and Ivanka Trump arrive in Saudi Arabia sans headscarves

author: http://xml.zeit.de/autoren/H/Rieke_Havertz/index
description: Melania Trump tut sich schwer als First Lady. Sie wohnt noch nicht im Weißen Haus und ist selten an der Seite ihres Mannes zu sehen. Dabei könnte ihre Rolle mächtig sein.
title: Melania Trump: Im Schatten

author: Charlie Spiering
description: Americans buzzed over Melania Trump’s decision not to wear a headscarf in Saudi Arabia. In Saudi Arabia, the Arab News newspaper honored her.
title: Arab News: Melania Trump ‘Classy and Conservative’ In Saudi Arabia

author: Anushay Hossain
description: It's no surprise Melania Trump was a hit in Saudi Arabia, Anushay Hossain writes: She's their perfect combination of quiet, fashionable femininity and fake feminism.
title: The ugly truth behind Saudi Arabia's love for Melania Trump

author: Breitbart Jerusalem
description: Sara Netanyahu, PM Netanyahu’s wife, told First Lady Melania Trump that the two couples had more in common than pure geopolitical interests.
title: Sarah Netanyahu Tells Melania Trump of Common Bond: ‘Media Hate Us but the People Love Us’
